content:
I'd be happy to help.

However, I need a bit more information from you. Could you please tell me which city you're in or planning to visit with your sister? That way, I can provide you with a list of art museums specific to that city.

Additionally, are there any specific types of art or periods that you and your sister are interested in? For example, modern art, contemporary art, impressionism, Renaissance art, etc.? This can help me give you more tailored suggestions.

Let me know, and I'll do my best to assist you in planning a great day out with your sister!
